alert.note: Alert for Bell; Knox; Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 3:28PM EDT until May 19 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Bell County in southeastern Kentucky... Southwestern Knox County in southeastern Kentucky... Central Whitley County in south central Kentucky... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 328 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Julip, or near Williamsburg, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Gausdale around 340 PM EDT. Clate around 345 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include King, Swan Lake and Barbourville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
